title: Problem with the LoL Boards...
body:
So, if someone could help me out, i would really appreciate it.

The Discussions on the LoL Boards are really tiresome to read, since the answers to comments arent directly under the Comment, but they are seperated, looking like this:

http://i.imgur.com/2InyC8E.png

It is rather annoying.

On the EUW Boards on the other hand, it looks like this:

http://i.imgur.com/FTCYlpd.png


Is it an issue with the NA Boards? My PC? My software or something like that?
Or maybe cause i am on the NA Boards with an EUW Accpunt?

Any suggestions would help me.

replies.body:
Those comments might not actually be replies if they aren't nested under the previous comment. Sometimes the post can looks that way too if you click on the new comment button as opposed to clicking on the post itself.

If you want, give me a link to a post you think is displaying wrong and I can let you know how I see it ^_^.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K8Q4ZMRu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-30T20:43:52.056+0000)
>
> Those comments might not actually be replies if they aren't nested under the previous comment. Sometimes the post can looks that way too if you click on the new comment button as opposed to clicking on the post itself.
> 
> If you want, give me a link to a post you think is displaying wrong and I can let you know how I see it ^_^.


https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/xw9YYE5k-permanently-banned-after-starting-my-reform

Ahaaaa so I believe I see the problem. On your page, if you look at the top of the comments you should see a button called "switch to discussion view" and that's should do the trick!

https://i.gyazo.com/56f15050ee1d832f11301e3c438632c2.png
General Discussion is always set on Chronological View, you can't change it to Discussion view on that sub-board.
but why? D: it triggers me to look at it!
I cannot see this in General discussion posts.

How could i overlook that?

Thank you very much, for taking your time!

Ok replied to this comment.

It wont get shown as a comment to the comment, but as a seperate comment aswell.
